Constructor Detail

Audio

public Audio( SAMPLE* sam, bool loops );
Constructor
Parameters:
sam - Allegro audio SAMPLE associated with the object.
loops - Sets the loop flag

Audio

public Audio();
Default Constructor

~Audio

public ~Audio();
Default Destructor

Method Detail

LoadSample

public void LoadSample( char* file, bool loops );
Loads the sample at the specified file location.
Parameters:
file - Path to the audio file to load.
loops - Sets the loop flag

Play

public int Play( int volume );
Plays the sample at the specified volume.
Parameters:
volume - The volume at which to play the sample (0 to 255).
Returns:
The voice the sample is being played on.

ResetLoopFlag

public void ResetLoopFlag( int volume, int set_loop );
Resets the loop flag and volume of a playing sample.
Parameters:
volume - The volume to change the sample to (0 to 255).
set_loop - Zero to not loop, non-zero to loop.

ResetVolume

public void ResetVolume( int volume );
Resets the playing sample at the specified volume.
Parameters:
volume - The volume to change the sample to (0 to 255).

Stop

public void Stop();
Stops the sample if it is currently playing.
